CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 21, 1956, pg. 3 reads: "Fire Victims - Members of the John Hanners, a family of fourteen, gather around Miss Anne M. Gasson, Red Cross disaster case worker, for aid after a six-alarm fire gutted their Jewell [Jewel] Street home and left them homeless early last Friday. The parents have secured a North Side home but this week have little money for food and no funds for furnishings for the home. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of ten members of the John Hanners family surrounding Red Cross case worker Anne M. Gasson after house fire
